      void beforeChildAddition(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
      Invoked just before adding a child to the tree.
      Parent element is returned by event.getParent().
      Added child is returned by event.getChild.
      void beforeChildRemoval(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
      Invoked just before removal of a child from the tree.
      Child to be removed is returned by event.getChild().
      Parent element is returned by event.getParent().
      void beforeChildrenChange(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
      Invoked before a mass change of children of the specified node.
      The parent the nodes of which are changing is returned by event.getParent().
      void beforeChildReplacement(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
      Invoked just before replacement of a child in the tree by another element.
      Child to be replaced is returned by event.getOldChild().
      Parent element is returned by event.getParent().
      void childAdded(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
      Invoked just after adding of a new child to the tree.
      The added child is returned by event.getChild().
      Parent element is returned by event.getParent().

      Invoked just after removal of a child from the tree.
      The removed child is returned by event.getChild().

      The parent the nodes of which have changed is returned by event.getParent().

      • childRemoved

        public void childRemoved(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: PsiTreeChangeListener
        Invoked just after removal of a child from the tree.
        The removed child is returned by event.getChild(). Note that only equals(), hashCode(), isValid() methods can be safely invoked for this element, because it's not valid anymore.
        Parent element is returned by event.getParent().
        Specified by:
        childRemoved in interface PsiTreeChangeListener
        Overrides:
        childRemoved in class PsiTreeChangeAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - the event object describing the change.

      • childReplaced

        public void childReplaced(PsiTreeChangeEvent event)
        Description copied from interface: PsiTreeChangeListener
        Invoked just after replacement of a child in the tree by another element.
        The replaced child is returned by event.getOldChild(). Note that only equals(), hashCode(), isValid() methods can be safely invoked for this element, because it's not valid anymore.
        The new child is returned by event.getNewChild().
        Parent element is returned by event.getParent().
        Specified by:
        childReplaced in interface PsiTreeChangeListener
        Overrides:
        childReplaced in class PsiTreeChangeAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - the event object describing the change.
